            <string language="hu-HU">Fekete galagonya</string>
            <string language="en-US">Black hawthorn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwarzer Weißdorn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aubépine noire</string>

          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A fekete galagonya (Crataegus nigra) a Duna-árterének ritkasága</string>
            <string language="en-US">The black hawthorn (Crataegus nigra) is the rarity of the flood-area of the Danube</string>

          <description>

Rarität des überschwemmen-Bereiches der Donau</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'aubépine noire (nigra de Crataegus) est la 
rarité de l'inonder-zone du Danube</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O hawthorn preto (negro de Crataegus) é o rarity 
da inund-área do Danúbio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cratego nero (nigra di Crataegus) è il rarity 
della sommerg-zona del Danubio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μαύρος κράταιγος (nigra crataegus) είναι 
σπάνιος της πλημμύρα-περιοχής του Δούναβη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El espino negro (nigra de Crataegus) es la rareza 
del inundar-a'rea del Danubio</string>
          </description>
